content: keeping warm is not a luxury afforded to all these leg warmers are designed to fit the average adult and can be knit & distributed to anyone who needs a little extra warmth this pattern is the 5th pattern of the #love collection collection in collaboration with ashlee lackovic of smashlee stitches these legwarmers fit the average adult however the circumference is customizable by removing or adding 5 stitches and knitting to as long or as short as desired
